summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Sewerage Utility; providing for the billing and collection by the City Engineer for and on behalf of the Municipality of metropolitan Seattle (METRO) of METRO's Industrial Cost Recovery and High Strength Industrial Waste charges imposed upon industrial users of the Metropolitan Sewerage System pursuant to Public Law 92-500; establishing procedures for an Industrial Cost Recovery Program for industrial users of The City of Seattle's Municipal Sewerage System, and adding new sections 4.4 through 4.14 and 5.1 through 5.4 to Ordinance 84390.
